abstract: The British oil company said it would not back down in a fight against settlement claims it viewed as false.
snippet: The British oil company said it would not back down in a fight against settlement claims it viewed as false.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The British oil giant BP plans to step up its defense against litigation stemming from the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill as it continues to endure the financial fallout from the disaster, reporting weaker-than-expected earnings on Tuesday.

headline.main: Spill Claims Rising, BP Announces Weak Results
headline.print_headline: Spill Claims Rising, BP Announces Weak Results
